title: Predict Bangladesh Rice Export Values Using Domestic Production Data
problem_statement: Forecast INR value of rice exports to Bangladesh using historical production data with ≥65% data completeness in all columns. Leverage 2020-2024 production trends to predict 2025 exports.

join_plan.notes: Temporal join using 1-year lag: production in year X predicts exports in year X+1. Financial years mapped via cleaned year prefixes.

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Forward-fill for <15% missing values in 2024-25 target column

validation_plan: Time-series cross-validation with 80% training (2018-2023) / 20% testing (2024) split

excluded_columns.reason: Future data not available for training

expected_outputs: Regression model predicting INR export values
